title: Run FO-08 E2E test and verify pass
description:
Run the FO-08 E2E test and ensure it passes.

Prerequisites:
- Dev server must be running (npm run dev)
- KV store must be seeded (npm run db:seed)

Test command:
node --import tsx e2e/fo-08.test.ts

The test must pass completely, verifying:
- 8 fragments visible immediately
- 'More' reveals 15 additional fragments
- No progress bar
- Heart animation between screens
- Thumbs up/down rating
- Full flow completion

This is an AUTOMATED test - run the command and verify it passes.

Do not close this tick until the E2E test passes.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-08.test.ts completes with TEST PASSED
